row.process: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Deleteing data from analytics datastore now, this can take a while." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! :IF &SHRINK_DB# = "Yes" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "The size of the database will be shrunk" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "The size of the database will NOT be shrunk" :ENDIF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! !--------------------------------------------------------------- !do a first select 'analytics_datastore_delete_before' !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "select * from analytics_datastore_delete_before('&date_before_with_tz#');" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.INCLUDE.PSQL_EXCUTE@UNIX ! :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "1. Successfully removed data before '&date_before_with_tz#' from the datastore." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! !--------------------------------------------------------------- !do a second select 'analytics_datastore_staging_delete_before' !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "select * from analytics_datastore_staging_delete_before('&date_before_with_tz#');" :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = &ANALYTICS_PG_PASSWORD# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "PGPASSWORD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#/psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c ""&ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND#""" :P &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX ! :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "2.Successfully removed data before '&date_before_with_tz#' from the datastore (ah, laslm, ara_execution)." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! !--------------------------------------------------------------- ! Execute VACUUM on datastore now." !--------------------------------------------------------------- :IF &SHRINK_DB# = "Yes" : SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "VACUUM FULL VERBOSE;" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute VACUUM FULL VERBOSE on datastore now to free up diskspace." :ELSE : SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "VACUUM VERBOSE;" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute VACUUM VERBOSE on datastore now to free up diskspace." :ENDIF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "PGPASSWORD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD LC_MESSAGES='en_US.UTF-8' &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#/psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c ""&ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND#""" :P &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX ! :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Successfully terminated job: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.JOB.ANALYTICS_DATASTORE_DELETE@UNIX." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
